about: Hey :) So, I have decided that it is time that I left minecraft as a whole.  I used to be able to play and have time with my friends, family, etc. However, the more time I spent outside of the gaming world, the more I noticed how much I loved being around the ones I love.  I wanted to say thank you to all of those who have made me happy and made me want to stick around for a fairly long time.  But, a special thanks to PokerFace_Legend, Zaidms0987(Yusuf), jakesandobal, Rey_Gordo6, Snowcone202, Sabenza21, PandaDarkness, ghostrider_200, and nikkiice12. As for everyone else, thank you for being my friends and making Avicus an amazing community.  I love you all and thank you soooo much<3
